head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths YEUGELOWITZ, DARLENE MARY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths YEUGELOWITZ, DARLENE MARY

block.p: YEUGELOWITZ-Darlene Mary. On January 14, 1998. Loving daughter of Vincent W. Yeugelowitz and Carol Yeugelowitz (nee Lynch). Loving sister of Vincent and Theodore Yeugelowitz. Devoted fiancee of Thomas Long. Information: the Gary L. Kaufman Funeral Home at Meadowridge Memorial Park in Elkridge, Maryland, (410) 796-8024.

YEUGELOWITZ-Darlene Mary. On January 14, 1998. Loving daughter of Vincent W. Yeugelowitz and Carol Yeugelowitz (nee Lynch). Loving sister of Vincent and Theodore Yeugelowitz. Devoted fiancee of Thomas Long. Information: the Gary L. Kaufman Funeral Home at Meadowridge Memorial Park in Elkridge, Maryland, (410) 796-8024.
